description: Generate and automate reports from SeekTable.

actions.name: share_report_email
actions.description: Sends report in email body with optional attachments.

actions.name: upload_csv
actions.description: Uploads a CSV file and creates new or refreshes existing CSV cube.

triggers.name: new_csv_cube
triggers.description: Triggers when a new CSV cube is added to your SeekTable account.

triggers.name: new_report
triggers.description: Triggers when a new report is added to your SeekTable account.
